data.motivations: Travelers are motivated by the desire for adventure, relaxation, and the experience of natural beauty. Many seek an escape from city life and a connection to nature.
data.triggers: Emotional decision factors include a desire for new experiences, relaxation, wellness, and family bonding activities during the winter season.
data.desires: Tourists in Altai primarily seek exhilarating winter sports, rejuvenating spa experiences at thermal springs, and authentic local cuisine to immerse themselves in the culture.
